Key Match Events: Bam Adebayo flirted with a triple-double with 23 points, 9 rebounds, and 10 assists
Miscellaneous Highlights: Trey Murphy III scored 34 for the Pelicans
The Pelicans lost for the 29th time in their last 32 games and are 1-20 in their last 21 contests
Others: Jimmy Butler, in his first game following a five-game absence because of illness, had nine points, four rebounds and two assists in 25 minutes on 3-for-5 shooting
CJ McCollum scored 22 for New Orleans
